regen.absent_element: specific indications for call failure as busy line or network issues
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an indication of a busy line or network issues when the call fails to connect.

regen.absent_element: indication of specific reasons for call setup failure such as busy line or network issues
regen.new_specification: If the call setup is unsuccessful due to external circumstances such as a busy line or network issues, the system shall provide specific audible and visual indicators to the driver detailing these circumstances.

regen.absent_element: indications of busy line or network issues
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide specific audible and visual indications to the driver when the call is unsuccessful due to a busy line or network issues.

label: This shall also indicate if the called party was busy or if the network could not connect the call.
absence: specific indication of unsuccessful connect: busy or network error
